caption.title: Accuracy (panel A, values closer to zero indicate better accuracy) and sharpness (panel B, values closer to zero indicate better sharpness) of the predictive distribution of future incidence based on epidemiological assessments conducted each week.
caption.p: Colours correspond to different a priori distributions on the parameters: non-informative priors or informative priors based on historical data, either considered at the regional or the local level.
